query:
SELECT 
  po.id as orderId,
  po.orderNumber,
  po.customerOrderNumber,
  poi.id as itemId,
  poi.productId,
  p.sku,
  p.description,
  poi.requestedQuantity,
  poi.requestedUM
FROM pickingOrders po
JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId
JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
WHERE po.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005' OR po.orderNumber = 'PED-005'
ORDER BY poi.id;
command:

  po.orderNumber,
  po.customerOrderNumber,
  poi.id as itemId,
  poi.productId,
  p.sku,
  p.description,
  poi.requestedQuantity,
  poi.requestedUM
FROM pickingOrders po
JOIN pickingOrderItems poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId
JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
WHERE po.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005' OR po.orderNumber = 'PED-005'
ORDER BY poi.id;
